citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
9:55am-10:25am on 14-SEP-17.
The inspector was unsuccessful making contact with any one at the facility during today's inspection. The inspector
tried to make contact with a facility representative on the number on file and left a voice mail when no one
answered. The inspector waited in the driveway of the facility for 30 minutes before leaving the premise.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
9:55am-10:25am on 14-SEP-17.
The inspector was unsuccessful making contact with any one at the facility during today's inspection.  The inspector
tried to make contact with a facility representative on the number on file and left a voice mail when no one
answered.  The inspector waited in the driveway of the facility for 30 minutes before leaving the premise.
